login.title: Secure, seamless remote access for the edge.

dashboard.description: This page will display all the projects/site you are having access to as individual blocks. It gives details of number of Edge Nodes in it, clicking on it will navigate to the Edge Node list page. Blcok also indicates the number of Edge Node Applications for respective project. It gives project level edge view policy status as "Edge View - Enabled" if it was configured otherwise "Edge View - Disabled". In a cases of project, not having any Edge Nodes created, we disabled the access and greyed out. The description of the project can be viewed as hover text, when you hover "i" icon in each project block

edgeNode.description: Lists all Edge Nodes of the selected project. User can Activate the Edge View Sessions, DeActivate them if already activated, ReActivate to extend the session. Once the Edge View Session is in Active session, user can download the scripts for remote connectivity. Each Edge Node is an navigational link to the list of Edge Node Applications linked to the respective Edge Node.

edgeApp.description: Here we have two set of information. Left side table lists all the Edge Node Applications linked to the selected Edge Node. Each Edge Node Application is a clickable link, on click of it, populating the list of IP Address, Host and Application ports configured for that Edge Node application, in the right side table.

dropdown.title: Descriptive Insights
dropdown.value: This page will display all the projects/sites you can access as individual blocks. Each block details the number of Edge Nodes within the project/site. You will be directed to that project's Edge Node list page by clicking on a block. The block also indicates the number of applications associated with each project. If configured, the project-level edge view policy status will be displayed as 'Edge View - Enabled'; otherwise, it will show as 'Edge View - Disabled'. In cases where a project does not have Edge View config enabled, access will be disabled, and the block will appear greyed out. To view the description of a project, hover over the 'i' icon in each project block.

viewSession.activatingInfo: It may take up to more than 30 seconds to activate a session.

toastError.errorMessage: Failed to get the details! please try after sometimes.
